Text:
(...There's no guarantee that all the intel we
receive is correct.)

(The legend of Olivier and the other Three Heroes...
once again demonstrated this reality to those of us
in the Shadow Garden.)

(The intel that Chi, formerly known as Lady Karen,
brought to us on the organizational structure of the
Cult of Diablos...)

(The lore and biology of dragons, retold to us after
Delta spoke with the Mist Dragon...)

(...Yes,Â even the intel about Sergey and Malak
contained some errors within the facts.)

(Intel is ultimately just info obtained from
individual perspectives. It doesn't always represent
the whole truth.)

...To reach the truth without being misled by
falsehoods, we must carefully scrutinize the intel
we've gathered!
Lady Alpha!!!
Eeeek?!
Seriously, at a time like this? Are you okay?
Y-Yes, I'm fine...!
But your nose is bleeding...

I'll clean myself up right away! But more
importantly!
It's an emergency! Lady Alpha!
An emergency...
...What kind of emergency?
A rebellion! Eta has started aÂ rebellion!
Eta? A rebellion...?!

She's leading a rebellion demanding an increase in
personnel and budget for the R&D department!
...What's their status?

She's involved some of the Numbers and other
members, and they've started clashingâwell,
skirmishingâat the training center!

They're using the demand for an increase in
personnel and budget as their slogan and adopting a
hostile stance against the Shadow Garden!

The training center is serving as a defensive
corridor leading to the heart of Alexandria...

If Eta's taken control of that entire area, then she
has a direct choke hold on Alexandria's neck.

It seems prudent to assume she's got control over
the training ground's golems and the slime-based
defense mechanismsÂ as well.
...Which Numbers are cooperating with Eta?
The ones we've confirmed are Lambda, Chi, and Omega!

The Numbers don't typically have the right to refuse
orders from the Seven Shadows, soÂ their demands and
stancesÂ areÂ currentlyÂ unclear!

So, they might be coerced into cooperating, then...
Which of the Seven Shadows and Numbers can we
mobilize?
Right, there's Delta and me!

And while not one of the Numbers, No. 93 can also be
deployed as a combatant!

...That should be more than enough. I'll lead the
charge. Follow me, Gamma!
Yes, ma'am!
Knowing Eta, she must be serious about this...!

The Garden must increase the budget for the R&D
department!
Increase theÂ budget!
Increase it!
Increase the number of assistants for Lady Eta!
Increase the number of assistants!
Increase them!

...Th-This may be on Lady Eta's orders, but should
we...really be doing this?!

Chi, what are you talking about? This is a matter of
life and death for us!
A matter of life and death?!

What do you think will happen if Lady Eta's
rebellion fails?
Wh-What will happen...?

We'll be paraded through the streets of the ancient
city of Alexandria, beheaded, and have our heads
displayed on a pike!
What?!

Plus, if we don't get more assistants, we'll forever
be caught up in Lady Eta's experiments!
*gasp*

In other words, no matter what, we're almost
guaranteed death! Our only hope is to win this labor
dispute, even if it costs us our lives!

Wait a minute, what's the point if we're going to
die anywayâ

But...the fact of the matter is,Â if we don't get
more assistants, we'll forever be caught up in Lady
Eta's experiments...!
Increase the number of assistants for Lady Eta!
...Increase the number of assistants!

ByÂ the way,Â aside from being beheaded, what does
"being displayed on a pike" mean?Â Do you know?
No... All I know is that it's some medieval term.

It means to be publicly humiliated and made an
example of.

There comes a lackey of the commercial
establishment!

Wh-What an insult...! I knew I was right in choosing
the opposing side!

Only one fate awaits those who oppose the Shadow
Gardenâdeath.

...Well then, Lady Omega. Are you ready to be
"displayed"?

Hahah! You're the one who'll be crucified instead!
I'll tie you to the scales of the training center!

Aah...this is totally absurd! But since we've
decided to fight, let's fight!
